content.title: TERMS OF BUSINESS
sections:
1. ABOUT US:
[FIRM_NAME] is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).
- FCA Number: [FCA_NUMBER]
- Registered Office: [ADDRESS]
- Company Number: [COMPANY_NUMBER]
- Permitted Business: [PERMISSIONS - e.g., Advising, arranging, dealing in investments]

You can check our registration: www.fca.org.uk/register or call 0800 111 6768.

2. OUR SERVICES:
We provide [SELECT: independent financial advice / restricted advice / execution-only services] in relation to [PRODUCT_RANGE - e.g., pensions, investments, mortgages].

[IF INDEPENDENT]: We assess products from the whole market.
[IF RESTRICTED]: We assess products from [LIMITED_RANGE].
[IF EXECUTION-ONLY]: We do not provide advice. You make your own decisions.

3. CLIENT CATEGORISATION:
We have categorised you as a [Retail Client / Professional Client / Eligible Counterparty].

[IF RETAIL]: You have the highest level of regulatory protection.
[IF PROFESSIONAL]: You have fewer protections. You may request retail client status.

You have 28 days to request a different categorisation.

4. OUR CHARGES:

[IF ADVISER CHARGES]:
- Initial advice fee: £[AMOUNT] or [%]
- Ongoing advice fee: £[AMOUNT] per year or [%]
- Transaction fees: [DETAILS]

[IF EXECUTION-ONLY]:
- Dealing commission: [%] or £[AMOUNT] per trade
- Platform fee: [%] per year

All fees are subject to VAT where applicable. We will agree fees before providing services. You will receive a personal illustration showing all charges.

5. COMMISSION AND INDUCEMENTS:

[INDEPENDENT ADVISERS - MUST STATE]:
We do not accept commission or incentives from product providers. We charge you directly for our advice.

[RESTRICTED/EXECUTION-ONLY - DISCLOSE]:
We [may/do not] receive commission from product providers. [Details in personal illustration.]

6. HOW WE ARE PAID:

[OPTIONS]:
- You pay us directly by invoice
- We deduct fees from your investment
- We receive commission from product provider (where permitted)
- Combination of above

We will confirm payment method before proceeding.

7. CLIENT MONEY:

If we hold your money:
- It is held in a segregated client account under FCA CASS rules
- It is separate from our own money
- Bank: [BANK_NAME]
- Protected if we become insolvent
- Interest: [paid to you / retained by us]

[IF NOT HOLDING CLIENT MONEY]: We do not hold client money. Payments go directly to product providers.

8. CANCELLATION RIGHTS:

[IF DISTANCE CONTRACT]: You have 14 days to cancel this agreement from the date of acceptance.

[PRODUCT CANCELLATION]: Many financial products have cooling-off periods (typically 14-30 days). Details in product terms.

9. CONFLICTS OF INTEREST:

We have a Conflicts of Interest Policy to identify and manage conflicts. We will disclose material conflicts before providing services. Policy available on request.

10. DATA PROTECTION:

We process your personal data under UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018. Privacy Notice: [PRIVACY_URL].

11. COMMUNICATING WITH YOU:

We will communicate by [email/post/phone/secure portal]. You agree we may contact you by these methods.

We may record calls for training, quality, and regulatory compliance. Recordings are our property.

12. COMPLAINTS:

If you have a complaint:
- Contact: [COMPLAINTS_EMAIL] or [COMPLAINTS_PHONE]
- We will acknowledge within 5 business days
- We aim to resolve within 8 weeks
- If not satisfied, refer to Financial Ombudsman Service (www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk) within 6 months

Full Complaints Procedure: [COMPLAINTS_POLICY_URL]

13. COMPENSATION:

We are covered by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS).

If we cannot meet our obligations:
- Investments: Up to £85,000 per person
- Insurance intermediation: Up to £85,000 (for professional negligence claims)
- Home finance: Up to £85,000

Details: www.fscs.org.uk or 0800 678 1100

14. YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

You must:
- Provide accurate and complete information
- Notify us of changes to your circumstances
- Read all documentation we send
- Ask questions if you don't understand
- Make your own decision (even if we advise)

15. SUITABILITY AND APPROPRIATENESS:

[IF ADVISED]: We will assess suitability based on your objectives, knowledge, experience, and financial situation. We will provide a personal recommendation and suitability report.

[IF COMPLEX PRODUCTS]: We will assess appropriateness based on your knowledge and experience. We may warn you if the product is not appropriate.

16. BEST EXECUTION:

When executing your orders, we will take all sufficient steps to achieve best execution (best possible result considering price, costs, speed, likelihood of execution and settlement). Best Execution Policy: [BEST_EX_URL]

17. LIABILITY:

Our liability is limited to losses directly caused by our negligence, fraud, or breach of FCA rules. We are not liable for:
- Market movements
- Performance of products
- Acts of product providers
- Events beyond our control

Nothing limits liability for death/injury or fraud.

18. TERMINATION:

Either party may terminate on [NOTICE_PERIOD] written notice. Termination does not affect:
- Transactions in progress
- Rights accrued before termination
- Survival clauses (confidentiality, data protection)

19. CHANGES TO TERMS:

We may change these terms on [30] days' notice. Material changes require your consent. Continued use after notice = acceptance.

20. GOVERNING LAW:

English law. Disputes subject to exclusive jurisdiction of courts of England and Wales [except retail clients may sue in their country of residence].
